abstracts.cdata!:
In regard to project performance
            assessment ratings, the Uganda Bwindi Impenetrable National
            Park and Mgahinga Gorilla National Park Conservation
            (MBIFCT) Project had the following ratings: outcome was
            satisfactory; risk to development outcome was moderate; Bank
            performance was satisfactory; borrower performance was
            satisfactory; and M&E was modest. The lessons learned
            from the experience of the MBIFCT over the past 10 years are
            related to the fundamental premises of the project, its
            structure, the focus of its activities, the co-financing
            strategy, project preparation and supervision, and the
            integration of M&E into its routine operations.
